fullplot: When a homeless youth is murdered in the grounds of a Buddhist monastery in Bangkok, the Police do little to investigate, leaving Father Ananda - a former homicide detective - to try and solve the crime. With the help of an orphaned boy named Jak, Ananda travels the canals of the city to unravel the clues and catch the killer.
plot: An ex-cop Buddhist monk investigates a murder in his monastery in Bangkok.
title: Mindfulness and Murder
